location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 3243 of 1870 from William Wedderburn, Acting Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Lewis Pelly, The Political Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Letter in response to a report written by Pelly on trade between India and the Gulf of Persia.The letter focuses primarily on responding to questions and issues raised in the report; however the final paragraph gives the Government of Bombay's thanks to Pelly and highlights his work in producing the report.
